Verses: 1 leviyin Kumaarar, Kerson, Kogaadh, Meraari Enbavargal.
2 kokaaththin Kumaarar, Amraam, Idhsaar, Epron, Oosiyel Enbavargal.
3 amraamin Pillaigal, Aaron, Mose, Miriyaam Enbavargal; Aaronin Kumaarar, Naadhaab, Abiyoo, Eleyaasar, Iththaamaar Enbavargal.
4 eleyaasaar Pinegaasaip Petraan; Pinegaas Abisuvaavaip Petraan.
5 abisuvaa Pukkiyaip Petraan, Pukki Oosiyaip Petraan.
6 oosi Seraagiyaavaip Petraan; Seraagiyaa Meraayodhaip Petraan.
7 meraayodh Amariyaavaip Petraan; Amariyaa Agidhoobaip Petraan.
8 agidhoop Saadhokkaip Petraan; Saadhok Agimaasaip Petraan.
9 agimaas Asariyaavaip Petraan; Asariyaa Yoganaanaip Petraan.
10 yoganaan Asariyaavaip Petraan; Saalomon Erusalemil Kattina Aalayaththile Aasaariya Panividaiyai Seydhavan Ivandhaan.
11 asariyaa Amariyaavaip Petraan; Amariyaa Agidhoobaip Petraan.
12 agidhoop Saadhokkaip Petraan; Saadhok Salloomaip Petraan.
13 salloom Ilkkiyaavaip Petraan; Ilkkiyaa Asariyaavaip Petraan.
14 asariyaa Seraayaavaip Petraan; Seraayaa Yosadhaakkaip Petraan.
15 karththar Nebugaadhnechchaaraikkondu Yoodhaa Janangalaiyum Erusalemiyaraiyum Siraipidiththukkondupoga Seydhapodhu Yosadhaakkum Siraippattupponaan.
16 leviyin Kumaarar, Kersom, Kogaadh, Meraari Enbavargale.
17 kersomudaiya Kumaararin Naamangal, Lipni, Simeyi Enbavaigal.
18 kokaaththin Kumaarar, Amraam, Idhsaar, Epron, Oosiyel Enbavargal.
19 meraariyin Kumaarar, Mageli, Moosi Enbavargal. Leviyarukku Avargal Pidhaakkal Vazhiyaai Undaana Vamsangal:
20 kersomin Kumaaran Lipni; Ivan Kumaaran Yaagaadh; Ivan Kumaaran Simmaa.
21 ivan Kumaaran Yovaa; Ivan Kumaaran Iththo; Ivan Kumaaran Seraa; Ivan Kumaaran Yaaththiraayi.
22 kokaaththin Kumaararil Oruvan Amminadhaab, Ivan Kumaaran Koraagu, Ivan Kumaaran Aaseer.
23 ivan Kumaaran Ilkkaanaa; Ivan Kumaaran Abiyaasaab; Ivan Kumaaran Aaseer.
24 ivan Kumaaran Elkkaanaa; Ivan Kumaaran Ooriyel; Ivan Kumaaran Oosiyaa; Ivan Kumaaran Savul.
25 elkkaanaavin Kumaarar, Amaasaayi, Aagimodh Enbavargal.
26 elkkaanaavin Kumaararil Oruvan Sobaai, Ivan Kumaaran Naagaadh.
27 ivan Kumaaran Eliyaab; Ivan Kumaaran Erogaam; Ivan Kumaaran Elkkaanaa.
28 saamuvelin Kumaarar, Avanudaiya Mudharperaana Vashnee Abiyaa Enbavargal.
29 meraariyin Kumaararil Oruvan Mageli; Ivan Kumaaran Lipni; Ivan Kumaaran Simeyi; Ivan Kumaaran Oosaa.
30 ivan Kumaaran Simeyaa; Ivan Kumaaran Agiyaa; Ivan Kumaaran Asaayaa.
31 karththarudaiya Petti Nilaipetrapodhu, Dhaaveedhu Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Sangeedha Sevaiyai Nadaththugiradharku Sthaabiththavargalum,

32 saalomon Erusalemile Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaik Kattith Theerumattum Aasarippuk Koodaara Vaasasthalaththirku Munbaaga Sangeedha Sevaiyudan Thangal Muraimaiyinpadiye Panividai Seydhuvandhavargalumaagiya Manusharum Avargal Kumaararumaanavargal.
33 kokaaththiyarin Kumaararil Emaan Ennum Paadagan; Ivan Yovelin Kumaaran; Ivan Saamuvelin Kumaaran.
34 ivan Elkkaanaavin Kumaaran; Ivan Yerogaamin Kumaaran; Ivan Eliyelin Kumaaran; Ivan Thovaagin Kumaaran.
35 ivan Sooppin Kumaaran; Ivan Ilkkaanaavin Kumaaran; Ivan Maagaaththin Kumaaran; Ivan Amaasaayin Kumaaran.
36 ivan Elkkaanaavin Kumaaran; Ivan Yovelin Kumaaran; Ivan Asariyaavin Kumaaran; Ivan Seppaniyaavin Kumaaran.
37 ivan Thaagaadhin Kumaaran; Ivan Aaseerin Kumaaran; Ivan Ebiyaasaappin Kumaaran, Ivan Koraagin Kumaaran.
38 ivan Idhsaarin Kumaaran; Ivan Kokaaththin Kumaaran; Ivan Isravelin Kumaaranaagiya Leviyin Kumaaran.
39 ivan Sagodharanaagiya Aasaab Ivan Valadhupakkaththile Nirpaan, Aasaab Peragiyaavin Kumaaran; Ivan Simeyaavin Kumaaran.
40 ivan Migaavelin Kumaaran; Ivan Paaseyaavin Kumaaran; Ivan Malkiyaavin Kumaaran.
41 ivan Edhniyin Kumaaran; Ivan Seraavin Kumaaran; Ivan Adhaayaavin Kumaaran.
42 ivan Eththaanin Kumaaran; Ivan Simmaavin Kumaaran; Ivan Seemeyin Kumaaran.
43 ivan Yaagaadhin Kumaaran; Ivan Kersomin Kumaaran; Ivan Leviyin Kumaaran.
44 meraariyin Puththiraraagiya Ivargaludaiya Sagodharar Idadhupakkaththile Nirpaargal; Avargalil Edhaan Enbavan Kishiyin Kumaaran, Ivan Apthiyin Kumaaran; Ivan Malloogin Kumaaran.
45 ivan Asabiyaavin Kumaaran; Ivan Amadhsiyaavin Kumaaran; Ivan Ilkkiyaavin Kumaaran.
46 ivan Amsiyin Kumaaran; Ivan Paaniyin Kumaaran; Ivan Saamerin Kumaaran.
47 ivan Mageliyin Kumaaran; Ivan Moosiyin Kumaaran; Ivan Meraariyin Kumaaran; Ivan Leviyin Kumaaran.
48 avargal Sagodhararaagiya Matra Leviyar Dhevanudaiya Aalayamaagiya Vaasasthalaththin Panividaikkellaam Vaikkappattirundhaargal.

49 aaronum Avan Kumaararum Sarvaanga Thaganapalipeedaththinmel Paliyittuth Thoobankaattum Peedaththinmel Thoobankaatti, Magaa Parisuththa Sthalaththin Ellaavelaikkum, Dhevanudaiya Dhaasanaagiya Mose Karpiththapadiyellaam Isravelukkaagap Paavanivirththiyundaakkugiradharkum Vaikkappattirundhaargal.
50 aaronin Kumaararil Eleyaasar Enbavanudaiya Kumaaran Pinegaas; Ivan Kumaaran Abisuvaa.
51 ivan Kumaaran Pukki; Ivan Kumaaran Oosi, Ivan Kumaaran Seraagiyaa.
52 ivan Kumaaran Meraayodh; Ivan Kumaaran Amariyaa; Ivan Kumaaran Agiththoop.
53 ivan Kumaaran Saadhok; Ivan Kumaaran Agimaas.
54 avargal Pettaigalinpadiye Avargal Ellaikkullaana Avargal Vaasasthalangalaavana: Kokaaththiyarin Vamsamaana Aaronin Puththirarukku Vizhundha Seettinpadiye,
55 yoodhaadhesaththilirukkira Epronaiyum Adhai Sutriyirukkira Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal.
56 andhap Pattanaththin Vayalgalaiyum Adhin Pattigalaiyum Eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaalebukkuk Koduththaargal.
57 ippadiye Aaronin Puththirarukku Epron Ennum Adaikkalappattanangalil Ondraiyum, Lipnaavaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Yaaththeeraiyum Esthamovaavaiyum Avatrin Velinilangalaiyum,
58 eelenaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Thepeeraiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
59 aasaanaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Pedhsemesaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,

60 benyameen Koththiraththile Kebaavaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Alemeththaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Aanadhoththaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Ivargal Vamsangalukkuk Koduththa Ivargal Pattanangalellaam Padhinmoondru.
61 kokaaththin Matrap Puththirarukku Veroru Koththira Vamsaththilum, Paadhikkoththiramaagiya Manaaseyin Paadhiyilum Vizhundha Seettinpadiye Paththup Pattanangal Irundhadhu.

62 kersomin Puththirarukku Avargal Vamsangalinpadiye, Isakkaar Koththiraththilum, Aaser Koththiraththilum, Napthali Koththiraththilum, Paasaanilirukkira Manaase Koththiraththilum Padhinmoondru Pattanangal Irundhadhu.
63 meraariyin Puththirarukku Avargal Vamsangalinpadiye Rooban Koththiraththilum, Kaadh Koththiraththilum, Sebulon Koththiraththilum Vizhundha Seettinpadi Pannirandu Pattanangal Irundhadhu.
64 appadiye Isravel Puththirar Leviyarukkuk Koduththa Pattanangalum Avaigalin Velinilangalum Ennavendraal,

65 seettuppottu, Silarukku Yoodhaa Puththirarin Koththiraththilum, Simiyon Puththirarin Koththiraththilum, Benyameen Puththirarin Koththiraththilum, Perperaaga Sollappatta Andhap Pattanangalaik Koduththaargal.
66 kogaadh Puththiraril Matra Vamsangalukku Avargal Ellaiyaana Pattanangal Avargalukku Eppiraayeem Koththiraththile Irundhadhu.
67 evaiyenil, Adaikkalappattanangalil Avargalukku Eppiraayeem Malaiththesaththilirukkira Seegemaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Keseraiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
68 yokmeyaamaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Pedhoronaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
69 aayalonaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Kaadhrimmonaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum,
70 manaaseyin Paadhikkoththiraththile Aaneraiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum, Peeliyaamaiyum Adhin Velinilangalaiyum Koduththaargal; Ivaigal Kaagaadh Puththirarilulla Matra Vamsangalukku Irundhadhu.
71 kersom Puththirarukku Manaaseyin Paadhikkoththira Vamsaththile Paasaanilirukkira Kolaanum Adhin Velinilangalum, Astharoththum Adhin Velinilangalum,
72 isakkaar Koththiraththile Kedhesum Adhin Velinilangalum, Thaabiraaththum Adhin Velinilangalum,
73 raamoththum Adhin Velinilangalum, Aanemum Adhin Velinilangalum,
74 aaser Koththiraththile Maashaalum Adhin Velinilangalum, Apthonum Adhin Velinilangalum,
75 ukkokkum Adhin Velinilangalum, Rekobum Adhin Velinilangalum.
76 napthali Koththiraththile Galileyaavilirukkira Kedhesum Adhin Velinilangalum, Ammonum Adhin Velinilangalum, Keeriyaaththaayimum Adhin Velinilangalum Irundhadhu.
77 meraariyin Matrap Puththirarukku Sebulon Koththiraththile Rimmonum Adhin Velinilangalum, Thaaborum Adhin Velinilangalum,
78 erigovukku Appuramaayirukkira Yordhaanukku Appaale Yordhaanukkuk Kizhakke Irukkira Rooban Koththiraththile Vanaandharaththilulla Peserum Adhin Velinilangalum, Yaadhsaavum Adhin Velinilangalum,
79 kedhemoththum Adhin Velinilangalum, Meppaaththum Adhin Velinilangalum,
80 kaadh Koththiraththile Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththum Adhin Velinilangalum, Maknaayeemum Adhin Velinilangalum,
81 esponum Adhin Velinilangalum, Yaaserum Adhin Velinilangalum Irundhadhu.
